dmca.title: [EV1-C1308955X] Copyright infringement and theft
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 11, 2006 10:34 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1308955X] Copyright infringement and theft Subject: [EV1-C1308955X] Copyright infringement and theft ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright infringement and theft Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 11 2006 09:01 am X-MailFrom: steed@olynet.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.211] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 11 09:58:38 2006 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Oct 2006 09:55:39 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 11 Oct 2006 09:55:38 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1160578533-9124-63-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from mail2.reachone.com (mail.reachone.com [216.177.236.2]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 6D0921C13 for ; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 09:55:38 -0500 (CDT) Received: from Chas (dialup-229-30.satsop.reachoneinternet.net [216.177.229.30]) by mail2.reachone.com (Postfix) with SMTP id 1AEFD426C for ; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 07:55:17 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <000c01c6ed45$442e7720$1ee5b1d8@Chas> From: "Steed" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright infringement and theft Subject: Copyright infringement and theft Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 07:55:16 -0700 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0009_01C6ED0A.973497A0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: steed@olynet.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Oct 2006 14:55:38.0637 (UTC) FILETIME=[5089C3D0:01C6ED45] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello- I believe you host wakeup2money.com. They are using the ebook World Wide Web Essentials as a gift for email sign-ups. I am the author of the ebook and they do not have authorization or permission. I have asked that they remove the book and they have not. Before I begin legal action I appeal to you to have them take that book off their site. I will await your reply. Thank You. Charles Steed MIME element (text/html)
Hello-
I believe you host wakeup2money.com. They are using the ebook World Wide Web Essentials as a gift for email sign-ups. I am the author of the ebook and they do not have authorization or permission.
 
I have asked that they remove the book and they have not. Before I begin legal action I appeal to you to have them take that book off their site. I will await your reply. Thank You.
 
Charles Steed
MIME element (text/plain)
